actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The giant makes two attacks, using Frost Axe or Great Bow in any combination.

actions.name: Frost Axe
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 10 ft. Hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Cold damage.

actions.name: Great Bow
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +9, range 150/600 ft. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Cold damage, and the target’s Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: War Cry
bonus_actions.description: The giant or one creature of its choice that can see or hear it gains 16 (2d10 + 5) Temporary Hit Points and has Advantage on attack rolls until the start of the giant’s next turn.
